qa_pair.question: When you say"100% waterproof" can the backpack be completley submerged but keep the contents dry?
qa_pair.answer: Yes it can, once properly folded at the top and the air release valve is closed.

rewrite.edit: The product can keep things 100% dry if properly folded and sealed.
Yes it can, once properly folded at the top and the air release valve is closed.
The backpack can be completely submerged once it's folded at the top and the air release valve is closed.

qa_pair.question: When you say"100% waterproof" can the backpack be completley submerged but keep the contents dry?
qa_pair.answer: Yes, if you can even get it to go under water. It's so effective it can be used as a floatation device

qa_pair.question: When you say"100% waterproof" can the backpack be completley submerged but keep the contents dry?
qa_pair.answer: As long as you close it correctly, yes, at least for a time.  I haven't done a long-term time test, but I have completely submerged it and not seen bubbles leaking out.  Please note that when closed correctly unless purged air will also be trapped in the bag, causing it to float unless something else drags it under.  Even when purged, some air will be trapped in the bag.  I did a 30 second test, but if you plan on using this as a dive bag or something of similar nature you should do your own tests.  That said it is made similarly to dive bags and so should function similarly.

qa_pair.question: are the shoulder and hip straps adjustable?
qa_pair.answer: They're not. The shoulder straps can be shorten or extended at the bottom and at the buckles for the hip straps. The opening at the top is also tapered. Bought the pack for my electronics but the hole was a bit small to squeeze through.

qa_pair.question: are the shoulder and hip straps adjustable?
qa_pair.answer: Yes. The straps are adjustable. I also bought a separate chest strap as the pack did not come with one.

qa_pair.question: are the shoulder and hip straps adjustable?
qa_pair.answer: Yes, both the shoulder and hip straps are adjustable via friction clips similar to what you find on most standard backpacks.  (Just look at a school backpack)  The padding does not move, but you would have to expand it pretty big to cause a problem.  Something to note, the waist strap is just that.  It isn't really loadbearing, it's just to keep it from flopping around.

qa_pair.question: are the shoulder and hip straps adjustable?

qa_pair.question: Lock Laces - can you lace them up as tight as you want?
qa_pair.answer: Yes, and you bring up a good point about tight shoe laces.  Something as simple as keeping your laces tied up good might actually help prevent Achilles tendinitis! (if you do have it, suggest doing eccentric exercises like the kind in the book Treat Your Own Achilles Tendinitis). A 2010 study in the Clinical Journal of Sports Medicine showed that keeping your laces tied up did significantly reduce tension on your Achilles tendon - compared with untied laces.

qa_pair.question: Can the digital read out that comes with the F-1 Master work with this?
qa_pair.answer: Only extras tht can be added to the F1 would be a printer or a pushbutton remote. Printer is more expensive then the unit itself.. But the pushbutton remote can be made yourself for about $10 in parts from Radio Shack.. Do a YouTube search and you will find a number videos detailing how this is put together... No real wiring or electrical expertise needed. If you can solder then you can build one.. Mine works great and gives the same info as a printer would.. You just have to make sure to have a pad of paper to write down the info it displays for each string of shots.

summary: The display on this product is made of glass and is a very nice feature. This product's box width is 10.1" and a length of 7.8" long. Each section on the display box has a width of 2.3" and is 3.9" long. There shouldn't be an issue with putting large men's watches inside the display box. It is capable of fitting small and larger face watches inside of it. While the product is capable of fitting women's watches, it's design is more suitable for men's watches. The display box is designed so that the dividers aren't able to be removed. However, the cushion forms that hold the watches are fully removable. This watch display box would most likely be able to hold pocket watches. The only catch  is you might have to remove the pillow or put the pocket watch under it. The product is the same dark brown color that is displayed in the picture. This makes it a great addition to any room. Each section of the display box is about 1 and a half inches wide. Some of today's huge watches can't be used with it.
